title: Busco alguien quien habla ingles (Sorry I'm horrible at Spanish)
body:
Looking for anyone who speaks english to flex queue or play games in general. Please add me: GasMaskAdc
Edit: Now looking for some support or junglers who speak english to duo ranked

replies.body: I'm horrible at english, but I'll try =)
I like that idea! I can be jungler or support you whenever you wish, Add me!
Lo mas hilarante es que varios no saben hablar español y quieren hablar en una lengua que no es la madre.
Hello there! feel free to add me if you wanna duo or whatever, besides it would be a good opportunity for me to practise  my english with a native speaker. Cheers.
If u want add me, but iam Platinuim 3. That is a problem?
hello there, i speak a little, if u wanna try playing some matchs will be awesome

how do to play here? 
From where are you?
I think I may be useful. And can be a good exercise, too. Here is a player of both supp and jg. That said, I'm just Silver V, so, may be not that useful xD

I wish you luck in your search.
I ask.
Which country you come from?

{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

I'm down for it.

I main supp and have a decent level of english (i guess), add me and we can talk about those duo's{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
